name: Astonished Face
baseMeaning: A face with wide open eyes and an open mouth, looking shocked.
tldr: Shocked, surprised, or mind-blown. Genuine astonishment.

platformNotes.note: Common reaction to shocking news or plot twists.
Used in personal conversations for genuine surprise.

generationalNotes.note: Used for genuine and exaggerated shock.
